definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Are the program effects attainted at a reasonable cost?
sentences.chinese: 为取得计划效果所花费的成本是否合理？

sentences.english: The results indicate that using standard grade to arrange is better. Also, the concrete method is given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出用标准分排序更为合理，并给出具体做法。

sentences.english: Experiments show the proper application of this method can improve the effects of shot-put teaching.
sentences.chinese: 经过实验研究，合理运用可以优化教学效果。

sentences.english: Time is the most fair and reasonable-it never gives more to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 时间是最公平合理的，它从不多给谁一分钟。

sentences.english: The calculated results of energy gap on alkaline earth mixed halides are reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 对碱土金属复卤化物的能隙进行了计算，结果合理。

sentences.english: Do you think the packaging of Yakult is acceptable?
sentences.chinese: 你认为益力多的包装合理吗？

sentences.english: Behaviour that may be rational for individual actors can cause chaos if everyone copies it.
sentences.chinese: 个人合理的行为，若是每个人都照样做就会造成混乱。

sentences.english: But the request for “sayings” was not an unreasonable one.
sentences.chinese: 然而“惊世之语”并非不合理的请求。

sentences.english: Therefore, it made water body in the ci…
sentences.chinese: 合理利用地表水体的自净作用。

sentences.english: they don't pay fair wages, their hours are inhumane,
sentences.chinese: 工资不合理，工作时间太没人性了。

sentences.english: The reasonable color combination can make your beautiful eyes more charming and attractive.
sentences.chinese: 合理的色彩组合，令双眼妩媚动人。

sentences.english: Three, we will spend the excess revenue in the central government budget in an appropriate way.
sentences.chinese: 三是合理安排中央财政超收收入。

sentences.english: It is confirmed by some experiments. so the design is logical and viable.
sentences.chinese: 由此证明如此设计是合理可行的。

sentences.english: The third part is the guarantee of the rationality of free proof system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章为保障自由心证合理性的具体制度考察。

sentences.english: I am sure my opinion is both sound and well-grounded.
sentences.chinese: 我可以肯定我的看法既合情合理又有凭有据。

sentences.english: They span the planet, allocating resources as they see fit and competing to win customers.
sentences.chinese: 他们在全球合理分配资源，相互竞争以赢得客户。

definition: in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
